text: Dividend-in-specie to shareholders; medium-term valuation above book. Upon successful listing  the group will present dividend-in-specie shares of investment listing to existing shareholders on a one-to-one basis. Management aims to deliver value to shareholders with an investment listing valuation above book over the medium term.From the DBS website
